experiences.description: Led product development for a new smart grid platform, resulting in a 30% increase in user adoption. Conducted market research, defined product requirements, and managed cross-functional teams to deliver successful product releases. Implemented Agile methodologies to improve development efficiency and product quality.

Managed a portfolio of energy management products, responsible for defining the product vision, strategy, and roadmap. Conducted competitive analysis and identified market opportunities to drive product innovation. Collaborated with engineering, marketing, and sales teams to launch new products and achieve revenue targets. Mentored junior product managers and fostered a culture of continuous improvement.

education.description: Specialized in renewable energy technologies. Conducted research on advanced battery storage solutions. Developed a prototype for a solar-powered water purification system.
Focused on strategic management and marketing. Developed a business plan for a new energy efficiency service. Participated in case competitions and won awards for innovation.
